name: Dice Board
description:
This is probably the only attempt at making a game in like 8 months lol, hope it turned out good!

Instructions: You are given a board of randomly generated dice, and a pattern to recreate on said board, Your goal is to try and recreate it as best as you can before the time runs out.

Controls:
(Essential) Space - Show/Hide the pattern you are given to recreate.
(Quality of life) Enter - Show/Hide the border of the dice, making it a lot easier to see what number each die is.
. - Skips the pattern, effectively as if you had run out of time.

Features planned to be added: A global leaderboard system, and a pattern editor (Note: These will probably not get added, as the code is a complete mess, and I would also have no reason to as this game will probably get seen by effectively no one)

Credit: HeatleyBros for music
